name: Galaxy Defender 2017
description:
The alien spaceships are back once again and the call of duty has begun. Most of the defenders have been destroyed and now with more alien ships than ever you will have to initiate the assault yourself.

Ad-free game!!

One-Time payment of £0.99!!

Space Shooter: Galaxy Defenders puts you at the forefront of a battle with space invaders. You will assume control of a spaceship and must protect the galaxy from the massive alien swarms. How many enemies can you defeat before you are beaten?

FEATURE
- Amazing lighting and special effects
- Includes Power-ups and Mini Bosses!
- Global LeaderBoards.
- Unlock-able Insane Mode for those who want a real challenge.

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap and Drag to Move Spaceship
- Tap to Shoot
- Upgrade your weapon by collecting the power-ups.
- Continue to defeat the aliens to unlock more levels!

The Galaxy's future is now in your hands. Get your weapons ready for the final battle.

Ad-free game!!

One-Time payment of £0.99!!

Download now!!!
